ComicInfo.Summary:
ALIENS AND AVENGERS FACE OFF!
It's all led to this: Xenomorphs reach Earth! The perfect organism meets a planet of superhumans. Who will be first to fall?
Legendary collaborators Jonathan Hickman and Esad Ribic cut loose in this four-part epic unmissable for Marvel and Alien fans alike!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-09-02 23:21:12. [CVDB1067974]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Esad Ribic, John Tyler Christopher, Marcelo Maiolo, Mark Brooks, Skottie Young, Tony Daniel, Zu Orzu
ComicInfo.Editor: C.B. Cebulski, Lindsey Cohick, Sarah Brunstad
ComicInfo.Characters: Alien Queen, Alien Warrior, Apocalypse, Azari, Black Bolt, Black Panther, Carol Danvers, Hulk, Krakoa (Grandchild), Lockjaw, Miles Morales, Triton, Valeria Richards, Venom
ComicInfo.Teams: Aliens (Xenomorphs), Atlanteans, Avengers, Facehuggers, Hatut Zeraze, Inhumans, Intergalactic Empire of Wakanda, Shi'ar, Weyland Industries
ComicInfo.Locations: Africa, Atlantis, Attilan, California, Earth, France, Krakoa, Moscow, North America, Paris, Russia, San Francisco, Space, Wakanda
